mapper.select: SELECT '조사대기' AS NM, COALESCE(COUNT(*),0) AS CNT FROM TN_FEIS_PCS_FIELDINFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN TN_FEIS_PCS_SVYMEMO B ON A.SVY_LABEL = B.SVYID WHERE TO_CHAR(A.CREAT_DT,'YYYY') = (SELECT MAX(TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT,'YYYY')) FROM TN_FEIS_PCS_FIELDINFO) AND B.SVYID IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT '조사완료' AS NM, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM TN_FEIS_PCS_SVYMEMO WHERE SVYDT IS NOT NULL AND TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT,'YYYY') = (SELECT MAX(TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT,'YYYY')) FROM TN_FEIS_PCS_FIELDINFO)

SELECT REGEXP_REPLACE(A.NM,'([^가-힣])*','','g') AS NM, COALESCE(B.CNT,0) AS STRP, COALESCE(C.CNT,0) AS COMP FROM ( SELECT CTPRVN_NM AS NM FROM TF_FEIS_CTPRVN ORDER BY CTPRVN_NM ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR::JSON->3->>'VALUE',' ','','g') AS NM,COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM TN_FEIS_PCS_FIELDINFO WHERE TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT,'YYYY') = (SELECT MAX(TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT,'YYYY')) FROM TN_FEIS_PCS_FIELDINFO) GROUP BY REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR::JSON->3->>'VALUE',' ','','g') ) B ON A.NM = B.NM LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SD AS NM, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM TN_FEIS_PCS_SVYMEMO WHERE SVYDT IS NOT NULL AND TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT,'YYYY') = (SELECT MAX(TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT,'YYYY')) FROM TN_FEIS_PCS_FIELDINFO) GROUP BY SD ) C ON A.NM = C.NM

SELECT A.MON AS MON, COALESCE(B.CNT,0) AS CNT FROM ( SELECT SERIES AS MON FROM GENERATE_SERIES(1,12) AS SERIES ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT,'MM')::INT AS MON, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM TN_FEIS_PCS_SVYMEMO WHERE TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT,'YYYY') = (SELECT MAX(TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT,'YYYY')) FROM TN_FEIS_PCS_FIELDINFO) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT,'MM') ) B ON A.MON::TEXT = B.MON::TEXT ORDER BY MON
